00024 ComponentInstanceEditor::ComponentInstanceEditor(QWidget *parent):
00025 QWidget(parent),
00026 component_(0),
00027 vlnvDisplayer_(this),
00028 nameGroup_(this, tr("Instance name")),
00029 configurableElements_(this),
00030 editProvider_() {
00031 
00032         vlnvDisplayer_.hide();
00033         nameGroup_.hide();
00034         configurableElements_.hide();
00035 
00036         vlnvDisplayer_.setTitle(tr("Instance model VLNV"));
00037         vlnvDisplayer_.setFlat(false);
00038 
00039         // set validator for the instance name
00040         VhdlNameValidator* vhdlNameValidator = new VhdlNameValidator(NULL);
00041         nameGroup_.setNameValidator(vhdlNameValidator);
00042 
00043         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00044         layout->addWidget(&vlnvDisplayer_);
00045         layout->addWidget(&nameGroup_);
00046         layout->addWidget(&configurableElements_);
00047         layout->addStretch();
00048 
00049         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00050                 this, SLOT(onNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(displayNameChanged(const QString)),
00052                 this, SLOT(onDisplayNameChanged(const QString)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(descriptionChanged(const QString)),
00054                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055 }

00057 ComponentInstanceEditor::~ComponentInstanceEditor() {
00058 }

00060 void ComponentInstanceEditor::setComponent( ComponentItem* component ) {
00061         Q_ASSERT(component);
00062 
00063         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->show();
00064 
00065         // if previous component has been specified, then disconnect signals to this editor.
00066         if (component_) {
00067                 component_->disconnect(this);
00068                 component_->disconnect(&nameGroup_);
00069         }
00070 
00071         component_ = component;
00072 
00073     bool locked = false;
00074 
00075         // get the edit provider that manages the undo/redo stack
00076     // TODO: Base class for the diagrams!
00077     if (dynamic_cast<BlockDiagram*>(component->scene()) != 0)
00078     {
00079             BlockDiagram* diagram = static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(component->scene());
00080         DesignWidget* designWidget = diagram->parent();
00081             editProvider_ = designWidget->getGenericEditProvider();
00082         locked = diagram->isProtected();
00083     }
00084     else
00085     {
00086         EndpointDesignDiagram* diagram = static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(component->scene());
00087         editProvider_ = diagram->parent()->getGenericEditProvider();
00088         locked = diagram->isProtected();
00089     }
00090 
00091         // set the vlnv of the component to be displayed
00092         vlnvDisplayer_.setVLNV(*component->componentModel()->getVlnv());
00093         vlnvDisplayer_.show();
00094 
00095         nameGroup_.setName(component->name());
00096         nameGroup_.setDisplayName(component->displayName());
00097         nameGroup_.setDescription(component->description());
00098     nameGroup_.setEnabled(!locked);
00099         nameGroup_.show();
00100 
00101         // set the component's configurable elements
00102         configurableElements_.setComponent(component);
00103     configurableElements_.setEnabled(!locked);
00104         configurableElements_.show();
00105 
00106         connect(component_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&, const QString&)),
00107                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setName(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00108         connect(component_, SIGNAL(displayNameChanged(const QString&)),
00109                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setDisplayName(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00110         connect(component_, SIGNAL(descriptionChanged(const QString&)),
00111                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setDescription(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00112 
00113         // if the connected component is destroyed then clear this editor
00114         connect(component_, SIGNAL(destroyed(ComponentItem*)),
00115                     this, SLOT(clear()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void ComponentInstanceEditor::clear() {
00119 
00120         // if previous component has been specified, then disconnect signals to this editor.
00121         if (component_) {
00122                 component_->disconnect(this);
00123         }
00124 
00125         component_ = 0;
00126         vlnvDisplayer_.hide();
00127         nameGroup_.hide();
00128         configurableElements_.hide();
00129         configurableElements_.clear();
00130         editProvider_.clear();
00131 
00132         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->hide();
00133 }
00134 
00135 void ComponentInstanceEditor::onNameChanged( const QString& newName ) {
00136         // create command to the undo/redo stack
00137         QSharedPointer<ComponentChangeNameCommand> cmd(new ComponentChangeNameCommand(component_, newName));
00138 
00139         disconnect(component_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&, const QString&)),
00140                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setName(const QString&)));
00141         editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00142         connect(component_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&, const QString&)),
00143                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setName(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00144 }
00145 
00146 void ComponentInstanceEditor::onDisplayNameChanged( const QString& newDisplayName ) {
00147         // create command to the undo/redo stack
00148         QSharedPointer<ComponentChangeDisplayNameCommand> cmd(new ComponentChangeDisplayNameCommand(component_, newDisplayName));
00149 
00150         disconnect(component_, SIGNAL(displayNameChanged(const QString&)),
00151                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setDisplayName(const QString&)));
00152         editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00153         connect(component_, SIGNAL(displayNameChanged(const QString&)),
00154                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setDisplayName(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00155 }
00156 
00157 void ComponentInstanceEditor::onDescriptionChanged( const QString& newDescription ) {
00158         // create command to the undo/redo stack
00159         QSharedPointer<ComponentChangeDescriptionNameCommand> cmd(new ComponentChangeDescriptionNameCommand(component_, newDescription));
00160 
00161         disconnect(component_, SIGNAL(descriptionChanged(const QString&)),
00162                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setDescription(const QString&)));
00163         editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00164         connect(component_, SIGNAL(descriptionChanged(const QString&)),
00165                 &nameGroup_, SLOT(setDescription(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00166 }
